etymologies: early 19th century: from Hindi koël, from Sanskrit kokila in the same sense

definitions: an Asian and Australasian cuckoo with a call that resembles its name, the male typically having all-black plumage.

notes.text: Genus Eudynamys, family Cuculidae: one or two species, in particular E. scolopacea

shortDefinitions: Asian and Australasian cuckoo with call that resembles its name
